# repository issue search

```r

res <- gh(
  "/search/issues",
  q = "involves:miles.mcbain type:issue in:title,body repo:tidyverse/dplyr" 
)
```

# find a user

```r

res <- gh(
  "/search/users",
  q = "miles.mcbain in:email" 
)

```

## get user's email

```r
library(gert)
library(dplyr)
gert::git_config() |>
  filter(name == "user.email") |>
  pull(value)
```
